channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-17322] Serialise BeeLine qtest execution to prevent flakyness
item.summary: Serialise BeeLine qtest execution to prevent flakyness

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:

ATTACHMENT ID: 12881923 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

+1 LGTM

Could you please run the test 2-3 more times before commit to be sure this solves the problem?
And after the commit we should create a follow-up jira to solve the root cause of this issue, or at least identify it.

Thanks for the patch zsombor.klara!
Peter

ATTACHMENT ID: 12882105 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

pvary
BeeLineTest failures seem to have disappeared. I think we can safely assume that the parallelism was the source of the flakiness.

Pushed to master.
Thanks for your contribution zsombor.klara!

Could you please create a follow-up jira, so we know we have to determine the root cause of the problem, and we might also close HIVE-16796 and HIVE-16959, so if the problem pops up again we can see it? What do you think?

Thanks,
Peter

pvary
I agree. I raised and linked the followup Jira and resolved the other two.
Hive 3.0.0 has been released so closing this jira.
